reviewText: Don't buy this... you can go the website and get both for 24.99

Drill Instructors with black boots, no volume from that weak series GySgt, using logs to get over the obstacles, recruits not sounding off. The list goes on and if Marine Corps bootcamp has evolved into the soft little Cub Scout troop we are all in trouble.
Very real to what it is really like (per my husband) but the yelling was too much for me
Delivered as expected. Good to watch.

I was hoping for more. It seems like a bunch of outtakes from a different movie. I still enjoyed some of it, as I was a Marine, so it brought back memories. If you weren't  in the Marines, you probably won't appreciate it.
My daughter is wanting to get on with the highway patrol. Patrol boot camp is like marine boot camp. I wanted her to see what she was going to experience. Quite effective.
